mapper.select: SELECT sm.menu_id, sm.menu_name, sm.menu_url, sm.menu_path, sm.menu_flag, sm.menu_parent, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_sort, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_multiterminal, srm1.role_menu_id, srm1.role_id FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT srm.role_menu_id, srm.role_id, srm.menu_id FROM sys_role_menu srm WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND srm.role_id = #{roleId} ) srm1 ON sm.menu_id = srm1.menu_id WHERE sm.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY sm.menu_id ASC
